name: Rimewing
description: The Rimewing resembles a giant moth with icy beauty and colorful wings.
memorable: Its unique ability to charm opponents with colorful ice crystals creates a tactical advantage.
goals: To charm and incapacitate creatures to avoid combat.
relations: Related to other small beasts and creatures of icy environments.
environment: Typically found in icy areas or cold environments.
strengths: Cold damage immunity adds resilience in icy conditions.
weaknesses: Low offensive capability and significantly low intelligence.
attacks: Uses its proboscis to deliver 5 piercing damage with a decent attack bonus.
most_powerful_ability: Frosted Wings creates a charm effect, incapacitating multiple opponents.
senses: Has darkvision allowing it to see in darkness up to 60 feet.
skills: Proficient in stealth and perception, aiding its ability to avoid detection.
additional_information: Has advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell due to its Antennae ability.
Predominantly relies on charm rather than brute strength in combat.
Often underestimated due to its small size and low Challenge Rating.
Can create a cloud of colorful ice crystals that is visually stunning.
Serves as a minor yet fascinating creature within the ecosystem.
test_queries: small ice moth with charming abilities
colorful creature that charms with ice
stealthy moth that uses charm tactics
